title: Cognitive Stimulation Activities – Daily Puzzles and Quizzes Tailored to User Preferences
summary: As a retired social worker, I want to engage in daily puzzles and quizzes that are tailored to my interests and abilities so that I can remain mentally active and continue to enjoy stimulating activities despite my reduced mobility.

title: Scheduled Reminders for Physical Activity Sessions
summary: As a retired social worker, I want ALFRED to remind me to engage in physical activity sessions so that I can stay physically active and manage my arthritis pain while maintaining my independence.

title: Progress Tracking and Feedback for Cognitive and Physical Activities
summary: As an older adult, I want to receive visual progress reports on my cognitive and physical activities so that I can stay motivated and engaged in maintaining my health and independence.

title: Personalized Challenge Creation
summary: As an older adult, I want adaptive challenges that evolve based on my performance so that I can stay physically and mentally active while accommodating my mobility limitations and managing arthritis pain.

title: Motivational Support - Goal-Setting Features with Celebratory Notifications
summary: As a retired social worker, I want to set personal activity goals and receive celebratory notifications when I achieve them so that I can stay motivated and maintain my physical and mental activity levels while volunteering and connecting with my community.

title: Emergency Preparedness Training – Regular Reminders for Safety Drills and Procedures
summary: As a retired social worker, I want ALFRED to send me regular reminders for safety drills and emergency procedures so that I can ensure my family's safety and feel more secure at home, despite my reduced mobility and managing arthritis pain.

title: Daily Prompts for Social Engagement Activities
summary: As an older adult, I want daily prompts for social engagement activities so that I can stay connected with my family and community despite my limited mobility.

title: Daily Mindfulness Reminders
summary: As a retired social worker, I want to receive daily mindfulness reminders with personalized content so that I can manage my stress and remain mentally active despite my reduced mobility and busy schedule.
